payload.content: The intelligence of humans can be traced to the aptitude of every individual cell in the body.

name: The intelligence of humans can be traced to the aptitude of every individual cel
content: The intelligence of humans can be traced to the aptitude of every individual cell in the body.

payload.content: The whole (of an organism) is greater than the sum of its parts (individual cells).

name: The whole (of an organism) is greater than the sum of its parts (individual cell
content: The whole (of an organism) is greater than the sum of its parts (individual cells).

payload.content: Michael Levin is an American developmental and synthetic biologist at Tufts University, holding positions as Vannevar Bush Distinguished Professor, director of the Allen Discovery Center at Tufts University, Tufts Center for Regenerative and Developmental Biology, and co-director of the Institute for Computationally Designed Organisms with Josh Bongard.

name: Michael Levin is an American developmental and synthetic biologist at Tufts Univ
content: Michael Levin is an American developmental and synthetic biologist at Tufts University, holding positions as Vannevar Bush Distinguished Professor, director of the Allen Discovery Center at Tufts University, Tufts Center for Regenerative and Developmental Biology, and co-director of the Institute for Computationally Designed Organisms with Josh Bongard.
